Method Detail

getMediaInstance

public Pipe getMediaInstance(MOIdentifier mOId,
                             FormatId fId)
                      throws ConverterException
Description copied from interface: ConverterFacade
This causes the converter to deliver mediainstance-data of the requested mediaobject in the requested format. If the converter is unable to provide the potential conversion a ConverterException is thrown. In normal cases a Pipe delivering the requested data is returned.

Specified by:
getMediaInstance in interface ConverterFacade
Parameters:
mOId - The id of the mediaobject
fId - The id of the format
Returns:
a Pipe delivering the requested data
Throws:
ConverterException - If unable to do conversion or if an error occours setting up the conversion.

getSourceMediaInstance

public Pipe getSourceMediaInstance(MOIdentifier mOId)
                            throws ConverterException
Description copied from interface: ConverterFacade
The converter returns a Pipe containing the source mediainstance-data of a media object. (The source mediainstance-data is the data of the mediainstance initially put in the mediaaccess) In this case the format of the deliverd data depends on the format of the mediainstance initially put in the system.

Specified by:
getSourceMediaInstance in interface ConverterFacade
Parameters:
mOId - The id of the mediaobject
Returns:
a Pipe
Throws:
ConverterException - If an erro occours when accessing mediaaccess

addMediaObject

public void addMediaObject(MOIdentifier mOId,
                           Pipe input)
                    throws ConverterException
Description copied from interface: ConverterFacade
Inserts the mediainstance data delivered by the Pipe and adds it as a mediainstance of the mediaobject specified. Additionally the Converter extracts meta-data of the mediainstance.

Specified by:
addMediaObject in interface ConverterFacade
Parameters:
mOId - The id of the mediaobject
input - the pipe delivering the mediainstance-data
Throws:
ConverterException - if an error occours setting up the add-process

removeMediaInstance

public boolean removeMediaInstance(MIIdentifier mIId)
                            throws ConverterException
Description copied from interface: ConverterFacade
This removes the specified mediainstance form the mediaaccess component.

Specified by:
removeMediaInstance in interface ConverterFacade
Parameters:
mIId - The id of the mediainstance to remove.
Returns:
Throws:
ConverterException
